isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 26-SI SERIES - REPAIR PROCEDURES - STATOR CHECKS

svcsubproc.title: (Omit for Overcharged Batteries)
svcsubproc.para: The stator windings may be checked with an ohmmeter. If the meter reading is low when connected from any stator lead to the frame ( Item D, Figure 7), the windings are grounded.
If the meter reading is high when successively connected between each pair of stator leads ( Item E, Figure 7), the windings are open.

A shorted circuit in the stator windings is difficult to locate without laboratory test equipment due to the low resistance of the windings. However, if all other electrical checks are normal and the alternator fails to supply rated output, shorted stator windings are indicated.
